name: xhr-assignment
description: use this website api :  `https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/photos` to get the photos using `XMLHttpRequest`  -  add click Event listener to the button with id `photosBtn` and   - create the Function `getPhotos`  to get the first 25  photos form the api    - use the html example to create the same style to show this details :   id , title , thumbnailUrl   add a link to the img so when you click on the img you will be redirected to the img url.
